wikipedia_page.main: Mitch Megginson (born 27 July 1992) is a Scottish semi-professional football striker who plays for Cove Rangers.

response: Aberdeen announced a series of pre-season friendlies in May 2010, including a tour of England and games in Scotland and Germany. The first pre-season friendly on 17 July 2010 against Highland Football League club Fraserburgh ended in a 1–3 defeat for Aberdeen. The following day, Aberdeen won 2–0 against Peterhead, with Mitchel Megginson and Michael Paton scoring. On 21 July, Aberdeen lost 0–1 to Dunfermline Athletic.
|Mitchel Megginson   Chris Turner   Bryan Prunty   Chris Kane   Colin Nish
